title: Gorgeous apartment in Austin, super close to the University of TX!
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE NOW!', 'Gorgeous 1 bedroom, 1 bath 645 square feet, located in the beautiful Hyde Park neighborhood of Austin, Texas.', 'Our gated community is super close to the University of Texas Austin!', 'Additional units will be available on August 22 and September 5, so schedule a tour today!', '*** JULY LEASING SPECIAL!', '***', 'Move-In gift card bonus: 1 Bed/1 Bath unit $100 gift card | 2 BED 2 BATH unit $200 gift card!', 'Receive a gift card once you move into one of our apartment homes!', 'Summit’s newly renovated floor plans feature custom fixtures and cabinetry, brand new appliances, luxurious bedroom carpeting, and high-speed internet access.', 'Enjoy outdoor R&R in our wonderful community space, which includes a fire pit, BBQ area, multiple picnic tables, and a fun-filled pool area.', 'Units have ceiling fans throughout, plenty of on-site parking with controlled access.', 'Your fur baby will feel right at home in our pet-friendly atmosphere!', 'Best of all, our residents enjoy a short commute to the heart of Downtown Austin, which is home to a wide array of upscale and local dining, shopping, and entertainment.', 'Summit at Hyde Park Apartments is conveniently located approximately 2.5 miles to the University of Texas at Austin, 4 miles from Downtown, and 6.5 miles from the Domain, making your commute a breeze, no matter which direction you’re headed in.', 'Summit’s location on North Lamar Boulevard in central Austin boasts walking access to the mixed-use Triangle development, nearby UT Austin shuttle bus stops, and convenient access to desirable retail, upscale restaurants, and major employers.', 'Come enjoy living at our beautiful community!', 'Property Address: 5200 N Lamar Blvd, Austin, Texas 78751', 'Rent: $1600', 'For more information, take a virtual tour, schedule an in-person tour and to apply online, visit <URL> or call', 'show contact info', "— or email us with your contact information and we'll have a community director reach out to you, at your convenience, with more information on floor plans, amenities, and to assist you with the application process.", '***', 'We reserve the right to change advertised pricing at any time and for any reason.', 'Advertised rent prices may differ from rent prices listed on property website.', 'Pictures shown might not depict actual units available.', '*', '**']
